Uses of Package
org.transitime.core

  • Packages that use org.transitime.core 
    Package Description
    org.transitime.applications
    Contains the top level static main() methods for the applications that constitute the Transitime system.
    org.transitime.core
    Contains the core classes that process the AVL data and create predictions, arrival/departure times, headway, etc.
    org.transitime.core.dataCache
    Contains server-side managers that keep track of real-time data such that it can be made available to clients via RMI.
    org.transitime.db.structs
    Contains the descriptions of the classes for the objects that are read and written to the database.
    org.transitime.ipc.data
    This package contains the low-level objects that are transmitted to the clients via RMI.
  • Classes in org.transitime.core used by org.transitime.applications 
    Class and Description
    ServiceUtils
    For working with service types, such as determining serviceId or appropriate block to use for a given epoch time.
  • Classes in org.transitime.core used by org.transitime.core 
    Class and Description
    ArrivalDepartureGenerator 
    AvlProcessor
    This is a very important high-level class.
    BlockAssigner
    Singleton class that handles block assignments from AVL feed.
    BlockAssignmentMethod 
    HeadwayGenerator
    Defines the interface for generating headway information.
    MatchProcessor
    For generating predictions, arrival/departure times, headways etc.
    PredictionGenerator
    Defines the interface for generating predictions.
    SpatialMatch
    Describes where an AVL report matches to an assignment spatially.
    TemporalDifference
    For keeping track of how far off a vehicle is from the expected time.
    TemporalMatch
    Describes where an AVL report matches to an assignment temporally.
    TemporalMatcher
    Singleton class that does the temporal matching to determine where an AVL report matches to the block assignment.
    TimeoutHandler
    For handling when a vehicle doesn't report its position for too long.
    TravelTimes
    Singleton class that contains methods for determining how long a vehicle is expected to take to get from one point to another on the assignment.
    VehicleAtStopInfo
    So that VehicleState can keep track of whether vehicle is matched to a stop.
    VehicleState
    Keeps track of vehicle state including its block assignment, where it last matched to its assignment, and AVL reports.
    VehicleStateManager
    For keeping track of vehicle state.
  • Classes in org.transitime.core used by org.transitime.core.dataCache 
    Class and Description
    VehicleState
    Keeps track of vehicle state including its block assignment, where it last matched to its assignment, and AVL reports.
  • Classes in org.transitime.core used by org.transitime.db.structs 
    Class and Description
    SpatialMatch
    Describes where an AVL report matches to an assignment spatially.
    TemporalDifference
    For keeping track of how far off a vehicle is from the expected time.
    TemporalMatch
    Describes where an AVL report matches to an assignment temporally.
    VehicleState
    Keeps track of vehicle state including its block assignment, where it last matched to its assignment, and AVL reports.
  • Classes in org.transitime.core used by org.transitime.ipc.data 
    Class and Description
    TemporalDifference
    For keeping track of how far off a vehicle is from the expected time.
